trans-unit.source: Provides data for mouse button related events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de rato botão eventos relacionados.

trans-unit.source: MouseButtonEventArgs is used with the following events: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>, and the corresponding tunneling events.
trans-unit.target: MouseButtonEventArgs é utilizado com os seguintes eventos: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp>e os eventos de túnel correspondente.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref>, timestamp, and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref>, timestamp, e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The logical Mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de rato lógico associado este evento.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hora quando a entrada ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The mouse button whose state is being described.
trans-unit.target: O botão do rato cujo estado está a ser descrito.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref>, timestamp, <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButton"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref>, timestamp, <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButton"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The logical mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de rato lógica associado este evento.

trans-unit.source: The time the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hora em que o evento ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The button associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O botão associado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: The stylus device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de caneta associado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the button associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do botão associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The state the button is in.
trans-unit.target: O botão de estado está a ser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the button associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o botão associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>classe fornece métodos para determinar o estado do rato e propriedades adicionais.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The button which was pressed.
trans-unit.target: O botão que foi premido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of times the button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de vezes que o botão foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: One use of ClickCount is to determine whether a double mouse click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Uma utilização de ClickCount consiste em determinar se tiver ocorrido um rato duplo clique.

trans-unit.source: Some classes expose events for a double-click, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: Algumas classes expõem eventos para um duplo clique, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>evento de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: When a double click event is not exposed on a class, a double click can be detected by using the ClickCount property on the event data.
trans-unit.target: Quando um evento de duplo clique em não está exposto a partir de uma classe, um duplo clique pode ser detetado, utilizando a propriedade ClickCount os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: The number of times the mouse button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O número de vezes que foi clicado o botão do rato.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Invoca processadores de eventos de uma forma de específicos do tipo, que pode aumentar a eficiência do sistema de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação casts o processador genérico como um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>e, em seguida, invoca o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre este padrão de implementação e as razões para o mesmo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>e [descrição geral de eventos encaminhados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: O processador genérico de chamada de uma forma de específicos do tipo.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: O destino de invocar o processador no.
